Amoxicillin.name: Amoxicillin
Amoxicillin.usage: Used to treat bacterial infections such as chest infections and dental abscesses.
Amoxicillin.side_effects: Possible side effects include nausea and diarrhea.

Apixaban.name: Apixaban
Apixaban.usage: Used to treat or prevent deep venous thrombosis and pulmonary embolism.
Apixaban.side_effects: May cause longer bleeding time and increased bruising.

Aprepitant.name: Aprepitant
Aprepitant.usage: Prevents nausea and vomiting after cancer chemotherapy
Aprepitant.side_effects: Common side effects include headache, fatigue, and constipation

Atomoxetine.name: Atomoxetine
Atomoxetine.usage: Works in the brain to increase attention and decrease restlessness in hyperactive individuals
Atomoxetine.side_effects: Common side effects include upset stomach

Calcitriol.name: Calcitriol
Calcitriol.usage: Treats low calcium levels caused by kidney disease and regulates parathyroid levels
Calcitriol.side_effects: May cause restlessness, difficulty thinking clearly, loss of appetite, and nausea

Carvedilol.name: Carvedilol
Carvedilol.usage: A beta blocker that slows down the heart rate and lowers blood pressure
Carvedilol.side_effects: Common side effects include dizziness, lightheadedness, and diarrhea

Celecoxib.name: Celecoxib
Celecoxib.usage: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain and inflammation
Celecoxib.side_effects: May cause stomach pain, heartburn, vomiting, and black stools

Duloxetine.name: Duloxetine
Duloxetine.usage: An antidepressant that increases serotonin and noradrenaline levels in the brain
Duloxetine.side_effects: May cause angle-closure glaucoma and other side effects

Eltrombopag.name: Eltrombopag
Eltrombopag.usage: Used to increase platelet count in people with certain conditions
Eltrombopag.side_effects: May cause serious liver problems and other side effects

Metformin.name: Metformin
Metformin.usage: Lowers blood sugar levels in diabetes patients
Metformin.side_effects: May cause general unwell feeling, fast or shallow breathing, and yellowing of eyes or skin

Montelukast.name: Montelukast
Montelukast.usage: Used to prevent wheezing and breathing difficulties caused by asthma
Montelukast.side_effects: May cause difficulty breathing, rash, and flu-like symptoms

Mycophenolate.name: Mycophenolate
Mycophenolate.usage: Used to help prevent organ rejection after transplantation
Mycophenolate.side_effects: May cause constipation, nausea, headache, and other side effects

Omeprazole.name: Omeprazole
Omeprazole.usage: Reduces stomach acid and treats indigestion, heartburn, and acid reflux
Omeprazole.side_effects: Common side effect is headache, and it may cause stomach-related issues

Oseltamivir.name: Oseltamivir
Oseltamivir.side_effects: May cause confusion, tremors, and unusual behavior

Pantoprazole.name: Pantoprazole
Pantoprazole.usage: Reduces stomach acid and treats heartburn and gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD)
Pantoprazole.side_effects: May cause infectious diarrhea, kidney problems, and skin reactions

Pitavastatin.name: Pitavastatin
Pitavastatin.usage: A statin that lowers cholesterol levels in the body
Pitavastatin.side_effects: May cause dark urine, diarrhea, fever, and muscle problems

Prasugrel.name: Prasugrel
Prasugrel.usage: Prevents platelets from forming clots that may cause heart attacks or strokes
Prasugrel.side_effects: Common side effects include blurred vision, dizziness, and headache

Prednisone.name: Prednisone
Prednisone.usage: Treats various conditions by reducing inflammation and suppressing the immune system
Prednisone.side_effects: May cause nausea, vomiting, heartburn, and trouble sleeping

Ramipril.name: Ramipril
Ramipril.usage: Lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels
Ramipril.side_effects: May cause sudden swelling of face, arms, legs, lips, and throat

Saxagliptin.name: Saxagliptin
Saxagliptin.usage: Used to treat high blood sugar levels in patients with type 2 diabetes
Saxagliptin.side_effects: May cause pancreatitis and other digestive issues

Sertraline.name: Sertraline
Sertraline.usage: An antidepressant that increases serotonin levels in the brain
Sertraline.side_effects: Common side effects include nausea, changes in sleep patterns, and diarrhea

Sitagliptin.name: Sitagliptin
Sitagliptin.usage: Helps control blood sugar levels by increasing insulin release and reducing liver sugar production
Sitagliptin.side_effects: May cause symptoms like fever, nausea, and loss of appetite

Tadalafil.name: Tadalafil
Tadalafil.usage: Used to treat erectile dysfunction in men
Tadalafil.side_effects: May cause difficulty urinating and painful urination
